title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction, I noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash unnecessarily. It seems there is too much flashing happening in the Control Example.
OB: All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
EB: Tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash unnecessarily.
